definition: chess/chess-like game/a game of chess/CL:盤|盘[pan2]/chess piece/CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
state of play in a game of chess/(old) chessboard
draw or tie in chess etc/CL:盤|盘[pan2]
scattered about like stars in the sky or chess pieces on a board (idiom); spread all over the place
to hesitate over what move to make (idiom); to waver/to shilly-shally

sentences.english: This game has become the focus in- and out-side the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 这盘棋成为赛场内外关注的焦点。

sentences.english: The newest version of the outrageously fun, smash-hit board game, Cranium?
sentences.chinese: 粗暴乐趣的新版本，捣毁击中了棋，头盖骨？

sentences.english: This is a regular field of the backgammon board.
sentences.chinese: 这是西洋双陆棋的常规区域。

sentences.english: Multiplayer Spades, Backgammon, Hearts, Checkers, and Reversi.
sentences.chinese: 多玩家黑桃王，双陆棋，红心大战，跳棋和翻转棋。

sentences.english: Multiplayer Spades, Backgammon, Hearts, Checkers, and Reversi.
sentences.chinese: 多玩家黑桃王，双陆棋，红心大战，跳棋和翻转棋。

sentences.english: Ron also started teaching Harry wizard chess.
sentences.chinese: 罗恩还开始教哈利下巫师棋。

sentences.english: Naci was playing backgammon with the imam from the local mosque.
sentences.chinese: 纳希和本地清真寺的阿訇在玩西洋双陆棋。

sentences.english: Why do you like international basketball-che?
sentences.chinese: 你为啥喜欢国际篮球棋呢？

sentences.english: While my mother and daughter play Monopoly, I busy myself making a salad.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈和女儿在玩强手棋，我则忙着做沙拉。

sentences.english: Drinking tea and playing shoji during a relax life everyday!
sentences.chinese: 每天过著下将棋喝著茶的悠闲隐居生活。

sentences.english: This is a bigger chess game that none of us can comprehend.
sentences.chinese: 全世界正在下一盘很大的棋，没有人能够真正读懂它。

sentences.english: Would you like to play chess with me?
You can play this chess game with your friend or Mobile.
sentences.chinese: 你可以发挥你的朋友或移动这盘棋。

sentences.english: I would stake all my money on the chess with you.
sentences.chinese: 我可以用我所有的钱跟你赌这盘棋。

sentences.english: He prided himself on having never been beaten in chess.
sentences.chinese: 他为奕棋从未被击败而自豪。

sentences.english: While my mother or daughter play Monopoly, I busy myself a salad.
sentences.chinese: 母亲和女儿在玩强手棋，我则忙着做沙拉。

definition: state of play in a game of chess/(old) chessboard
draw or tie in chess etc/CL:盤|盘[pan2]
kifu (record of a game of go or shogi)
see 蓮花落|莲花落[lian2 hua1 lao4]
ancient name for go (Chinese board game)
